== Google Summer of Code 2016 ==

Ubuntu is applying as a mentoring organization for Google Summer of Code 2016.

=== News ===

Unfortunately, Ubuntu was not selected to participate in this year. See you next year!

=== Participating ===

We are looking for both students and mentors.  See the appropriate page below for more information.

* <nowiki>[[SummerOfCode-Students|Information for students]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[SummerOfCode-Mentors|Information for mentors]]</nowiki>
* <nowiki>[[Ideas|List of project ideas and potential mentors]]</nowiki>

Participants must be eligible according to the rules of the Summer of Code program.

=== Who to contact ===

* If you want to discuss an idea, or if you have any concerns or suggestions, you are welcome to send a message to our mailing list, ubuntu-soc@lists.ubuntu.com.
* You can also reach us on our IRC channel, <nowiki>[[irc:--irc.freenode.org-#ubuntu-google|#ubuntu-google on freenode]]</nowiki>
